14 April 2009

On the way home

by alvachien

On the way home, with the setting sun.
At home, there is a sweat baby girl, who enjoying gnaw at her own foot.
And, posing for dad's lens as a professional model:
On the way home, for you...
Alva Chien
2009.04.14
